review: Love it.  Easy to install and use.
author: Katharine Benton

review: I am very pleased.  It is really cool that I can watch my Netflex on the living tv if I want to!
author: Jan Morris Harrod

review: Really easy to set up and use. Looking forward to getting into some more movies and TV before the fall season starts!
author: Elizabeth Bennet "thoughtful gifter"

review: Goodbye chromecast, speed and quality Exceeded my expectations in fact I also purchased the fire TV console and got rid of chromecast in bedroom and home theater. The Voice search has been impeccable and a true pleasure to use. The Netflix app is seamless and also very fast, no need for other applications to stream from any other sources.
author: Amazon Customer

review: I got this recently and I am very happy with it.  It does everything it says it does.  Perfect little thing for entertainment at home.  Highly recommended.
author: Marooned "Marooned"

review: Works great out of the box. There are so many alternate ways to stream stuff to your TV, but the fire stick for $39 is a no brainer! The remote control ALONE is worth that much.
author: S the Sark "Sarkmonster"
